title: Marvel Studios Hawkeye Episode 1 & 2 Review
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/morning to get 15% off your first order and free shipping.

Go to http://drinktrade.com/kindafunny and use promo code kindafunny to get your first bag free plus $5 off your bundle.

Go to http://warbyparker.com/kindafunny to get your home try-on kit.

Go to http://bit.ly/SMT5Morning to order Shin Megami Tensei V today on the Nintendo eShop!

The boys give their reaction to episode 1 Never Meet Your Heroes and episode 2 Hide and Seek of the fifth ever MCU Marvel Studios TV show Hawkeye.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
